comments.body: This is pretty subtle, but is there actually something different between the two sources? I know they do provide one for Windows and one for Mac and Linux, but they do look pretty similar when one downloads them. I remember discussion about line endings being different in some cases that @groutr has raised, but in discussion with @msarahan we determined this shouldn't matter. Not a big deal in any event, but figured I should figure out if there was something else I was missing here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@  fn:   sip-{{ version }}.zip  # [win]
  url:  http://sourceforge.net/projects/pyqt/files/sip/sip-{{ version }}/sip-{{ version }}.zip  # [win]
  sha1: afde507fbee85a1aeb5fcb32e897bd3ea2bc48f5  # [win]

build:
